example_of_database_string_format._comments: This is how to make your own connect string, or debug problems for example if you have Postgres 9.5 installed on a different port.

remote_database._comments: This won't work until you change the passwords

local_database._comments: Verify that this has the correct port for your machine

docker_with_local_python._comments: You may need to change the IP address and/or port for your machine.

s3._comments: Ask a project lead for the actual secrets.json if neeeded

other_secret_type._comments: Any API keys or other password-type strings can be stored like this.
